Frequently Asked Questions

Q: Are these shared leads?

Never. Unlike the big lead platforms, we send the lead to one company only. If you buy it, it's yours.

Q: How do you filter out the "repair" searches?

Our system is built to target homeowners searching for garage floor coatings, epoxy installs, and basement waterproof coatings‚Äînot crack repair or resurfacing. We exclude those searches entirely.

Q: How do you verify them?

Our system automatically checks the phone line carrier and email validity before the lead is sent to you.

Q: What if I get a bad lead?

If a number is disconnected or outside the zip codes you provided, we replace it at no charge.
